name: The Lost Mines
description: This is a DOOM II pwad. This is mainly a graphics patch. Use the install.bat to put my patch into your DOOM wad and DOOM exe. Replaces the Stupid dog-like demon with a chainsaw welding maniac! Looks great! Also changes barrels into out of order Cyber demons! Also looks great! Not a piece of sh** like a lot of other graphics patches.
